name: Cooking Class With A Local Family
description:
We go to your hotel to pick you up to start this tour. Then, we go to a local market to buy all the ingredients to cook some peruvian typical food and you will also appreciate our different vegetables, fruits, meats and other products available in Peru.

Later, we will go to to visit a local family where the cheff Dina will show you how to make the peruvian food, step by step to prepare one entrance and one main course. And  our tour guide/bartender Jhony will show you how to make the best Pisco Sour which is our traditional drink
